LanguageData.OE_TorraxinSerum.label: torraxin serum
LanguageData.OE_TorraxinSerum.description: A capsule of thick fluid containing a mixture concentrated combat stimulant Torraxin. Intended for use by melee fighters.\n\nCombat serums are not addictive and have no side effects.
LanguageData.OE_JoltixinSerum.label: joltixin serum
LanguageData.OE_JoltixinSerum.description: A capsule of thick fluid containing a mixture concentrated combat stimulant Joltixin. Intended for use by gunners.\n\nCombat serums are not addictive and have no side effects.
LanguageData.OE_LuraxinSerum.label: luraxin serum
LanguageData.OE_LuraxinSerum.description: A capsule of thick fluid containing a mixture concentrated combat stimulant Luraxin. Intended for use by psy-users.\n\nCombat serums are not addictive and have no side effects.
LanguageData.OE_AlcrexinSerum.label: alcrexin serum
LanguageData.OE_AlcrexinSerum.description: A capsule of thick fluid containing a mixture concentrated combat stimulant Alcrexin. Intended for use by mechanitors.\n\nCombat serums are not addictive and have no side effects.
